Redondo_Beach.Congregation Ner Tamid:
Congregation Ner Tamid is a Conservative Synagogue in Rancho Palos Verdes, California.
The clergy include Rabbi Brian Schuldenfrei, Cantor Rachel Goldman, and Cantor Emeritus Samuel Radwine.
The synagogue has launched a number of programs including the Adult Education, Preschool and USY programs.
